Articles.Content: Is there any word if xbox or ps4 will be getting 1.2 anytime soon and whats the likely hood of mods for console?
Can't speak to when 1.2 will come to the console versions but I would say that mods on the consoles are very, very unlikely.
Does anyone here actually think FTE are capable of bringing 1.2 to console?
Are they capable of bringing the current console versions to consoles in a working form?
Like all i want is some better parts ive got some ideas but need better parts to get them in orbit even the most powerful engines are too weak

Mike, what trouble are you having getting your stuff to orbit?  Have you experimented with your lifter design some?  If cost is no object, asparagus staging gets ridiculously heavy payloads to orbit (in game).  

I ask the obvious to cross off some easy sources of frustration early, not to seconds guess you or your creativity.  The faster we can get you flying, the faster we can get you to a fun place with this.
Ive tried that and between the parts limit and weight engines arnt strong enought
That and ive been wanting to try out some heavy space planes to build a huge station

On 11/16/2016 at 2:37 AM, Mikedonahue22 said:

Ive tried that and between the parts limit and weight engines arnt strong enought

So another obvious question to ask is how many engines are you using?  Are you it takes about 10kn (9.81, actually) just to support 1 ton of rocket mass.  So if you want to accelerate a rocket vertically at 2g, you need to have roughly 20kn of thrust for each ton of rocket.  This means you need either smaller rockets or more/more powerful engines.

Do you have any pictures of what you are trying to build?
